PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FanOccurrence
PropertySetDef.Definition: Fan occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcFan.

PropertyDef.Name: DischargeType
PropertyDef.Definition:
Defines the type of connection at the fan discharge.
Duct: Discharge into ductwork. Screen: Discharge into screen outlet. Louver: Discharge into a louver. Damper: Discharge into a damper.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 送風機出口の接続形式定義 Duct：ダクトへの吐き出し Screen:SCREEN内への吐き出し Louver:ルーバーへの吐き出し

PropertyDef.Name: ApplicationOfFan
PropertyDef.Definition:
The functional application of the fan.
SupplyAir: Supply air fan. ReturnAir: Return air fan. ExhaustAir: Exhaust air fan. Other: Other type of application not defined above.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Fanの系統 SUPPLYAIR, RETURNAIR, EXHAUSTAIR, COOLINGTOWER, OTHER

PropertyDef.Name: CoilPosition
PropertyDef.Definition:
Defines the relationship between a fan and a coil.
DrawThrough: Fan located downstream of the coil. BlowThrough: Fan located upstream of the coil.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: Fanとコイル間の関係定義 DwawThrough:ファンはコイルの下流に位置 BlowThrough:ファンはコイルの上流に位置

PropertyDef.Name: MotorPosition
PropertyDef.Definition:
Defines the location of the motor relative to the air stream.
InAirStream: Fan motor is in the air stream. OutOfAirStream: Fan motor is out of the air stream.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 空気流路と相対的なモーターの位置定義 流路内、流路外 その他

PropertyDef.Name: FanMountingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the method of mounting the fan in the building.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 建物へのFan設置方法定義 MANUFACTUREDCURB, FIELDERECTEDCURB, CONCRETEPAD, SUSPENDED, WALLMOUNTED, DUCTMOUNTED

PropertyDef.Name: FractionOfMotorHeatToAirStream
PropertyDef.Definition: Fraction of the motor heat released into the fluid flow.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 流体中にモーター発熱が放出される場合にTRUE

PropertyDef.Name: ImpellerDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Diameter of fan wheel - used to scale performance of geometrically similar fans.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ファンホイールの直径 - 幾何学的に類似したファンの性能を基準化するために使用。

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: IfcFanの値に付け加えられたFan属性
